wikitext.*:
'''Peter Xavier Price''' (born 1985) is a British artist and creator of artwork inspired by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[legendarium]], particularly [[The Silmarillion]] and [[The Lord of the Rings]]. He also paints landscapes from the English countryside.

Alongside illustration, Price is an academic historian who studied at the University of Sussex, UK, from where he holds a doctorate in Intellectual History. He specialises in the history of social, political, religious and economic thought.<ref>{{webcite|website=Wikipedia|articleurl=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Xavier_Price|articlename=Peter Xavier Price|accessed=6 October 2022}}</ref>
